name: 赌神模拟器：亚洲风云God Of Gamblers
name_original: 赌神模拟器：亚洲风云God Of Gamblers
description:
You are an agent, codename 996. One day, you accepted two secret missions from your beautiful boss: a terrorist organization planned a God of Gamblers contest, and conspired to win funds through the contest to launch a terrorist attack. Your superiors ordered you to sneak into the casino to participate in the game and win the grand prize of the God of Gamblers to thwart the plot of the terrorist organization. The second task is to retrieve a beautiful undercover policeman who had lost contact in the casino before. In order to complete these two tasks.
addictive gaming table
The gambling game in the game adopts the most popular baccarat in Asia. This kind of gameplay is simple and exciting, but if you want to win the game, you still need to keep practicing your gambling skills in the game.
